visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should include monthly rainfall data with the series name 'Rainfall'. Additionally, specify custom colors for the chart and configure other settings such as chart margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Rainfall'. The chart includes styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The x-axis represents the months with styled labels and a title, while the y-axis represents the rainfall in millimeters with its own styled title and labels. The data series includes monthly rainfall data with the series name 'Rainfall' and a custom color of '#008080'. Additional configurations such as chart margins, background color, and legend settings are also specified to enhance the visual presentation of the chart.
